name: cdk-validium-contracts
description: Core contracts for the Polygon CDK Validium
author: 0xPolygon

scripts.saveDeployment:sepolia: mkdir -p deployments/sepolia_$(date +%s) && cp -r deployment/deploy_*.json deployments/sepolia_$(date +%s) && cp .openzeppelin/unknown-11155111.json deployments/sepolia_$(date +%s) && cp deployment/genesis.json deployments/sepolia_$(date +%s) && mkdir -p deploymentOutput && cp deployment/deploy_*.json deploymentOutput && cp deployment/genesis.json deploymentOutput && npm run deploy:merge:genesis sepolia
scripts.saveDeployment:mainnet: mkdir -p deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp -r deployment/deploy_*.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp .openzeppelin/mainnet.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s) && cp deployment/genesis.json deployments/mainnet_$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:CDKValidium:localhost: rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-*.json && node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/2_deployCDKValidiumDeployer.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:testnet:CDKValidium:localhost: npm run prepare:testnet:CDKValidium:localhost && npm run deploy:CDKValidium:localhost
scripts.deploy:CDKValidium:sepolia: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network sepolia && npm run saveDeployment:sepolia
scripts.deploy:testnet:CDKValidium:sepolia: npm run prepare:testnet:CDKValidium:sepolia && npm run deploy:CDKValidium:sepolia
scripts.deploy:CDKValidium:mainnet: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network mainnet && npm run saveDeployment:mainnet
scripts.lint: npx eslint ./test && npx eslint ./docker/scripts && npx eslint ./deployment && npx eslint ./src
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint ./test --fix && npx eslint ./docker/scripts --fix && npx eslint ./deployment --fix && npx eslint ./src --fix
scripts.docker:tag:check: if [ -z "$TAG" ]; then echo "TAG not set!" && exit 1; fi
scripts.docker:push: npm run docker:tag:check && docker push snapchain/cdk-validium-contracts:$TAG
scripts.gas:report:file: rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-*.json && REPORT_GAS=true REPORT_GAS_FILE=true npx hardhat test
scripts.saveDeployment:mumbai: mkdir -p deployments/mumbai_$(date +%s) && cp -r deployment/deploy_*.json deployments/mumbai_$(date +%s) && cp .openzeppelin/polygon-mumbai.json deployments/mumbai_$(date +%s) && cp deployment/genesis.json deployments/mumbai_$(date +%s) && mkdir -p deploymentOutput && cp deployment/deploy_*.json deploymentOutput
scripts.deploy:CDKValidium:mumbai: node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network mumbai && npm run saveDeployment:mumbai
scripts.deploy:testnet:CDKValidium:mumbai: npm run prepare:testnet:CDKValidium:mumbai && npm run deploy:CDKValidium:mumbai
